input.sentences: the bike race started very early in the morning with many competitors .
these two racers are very close for the lead !
this bike racer waves to all of his adoring fans .
the top racers were given awards and bouquets of flowers .
relaxing and talking with friends later in the day .
output.sentences: The big cycling race started early in the morning.
As the racers started off one took the lead, although the others were close behind.
At the end, the winning racer waved to his loyal fans.
All the top racers were presented with flowers to celebrate their win.
With the race complete, the racers look forward to talking and relaxing with friends.
